page.title: 12TRAFFIC COUNT - CLANFIELD
page.content: A traffic count was carried out in the village centre by the church and the Rising Sun (a public house) in 15 minutes. The observers counted 27 cars, 5 motorbikes, 2 buses, 2 lorries, and 2 vans in South Lane moving towards the centre of the village and 29 cars, 1 bus, 1 lorry, 1 van, 1 motorbike and 1 bicycle moving away from the village centre. In East Meon Lane 13 cars, 3 vans and 2 motorbikes were driving out of the village, whilst 15 cars, 4 vans, 1 lorry and 1 bicycle were coming into the village. In North Road 7 cars were leaving the village and 4 cars and 1 motorbike were entering it.
